name: 2022 5th International Conference on E-business and Business Engineering
content: Paper Publication: All the accepted regular full papers will be published by ACM, and submitted to ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus after the conference. At least one author of accepted papers are required to participate this year's conference and make a presentation. ISBN: 978-1-4503-9865-7 Journal Publication IJEEEE: Some accepted papers will be published in International Journal of e-Education, e-Business, e-Management and e-Learning (IJEEEE), (ISSN: 2010-3654), which will be indexed by Engineering & Technology Digital Library, Google Scholar, Electronic Journals Library, QUALIS, ProQuest, EI (INSPEC, IET).
